trans-unit.source: Provides the transition to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in a state machine workflow.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> can be used only in state machine workflows.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> provides transitions only to leaf <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities (a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> that does not contain other <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities).

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> only provides transitions between two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes and does not support <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> to parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transitions or any other combination.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> has to be a leaf node within the activity tree of an event handler.
There can be more than one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> but all the activities must be leaf nodes.
<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> is always the last activity in the run path of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets or sets the name of the target state.
The name of the target stream.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName"></xref> property.
